name: Crysis Maximum Edition
summary: Crysis Maximum Edition includes Crysis and the new sequel Crysis Warhead. This epic story takes players into a changing environment, forcing them to adapt their tactics and conquer battlefields ranging from newly frozen jungles to gravity-free alien environments. Includes multiplayer such as Crysis Wars, a new multiplayer experience featuring new online game modes and 21 maps. 7 new maps are available for online combat.
